short_summary: Office furniture for the RCMP F Division Kindersley Detachment
description: The RCMP F Division Kindersley Detachment has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to Kindersley Detachment, Sask. by January 15, 2024.
full_summary:
# Office Furniture Tender Announcement
## Project Overview
The RCMP F Division Kindersley Detachment is seeking to purchase, deliver, and install office furniture to their facility in Kindersley, Saskatchewan, Canada, by January 15, 2024. This tender announcement is an opportunity for suppliers to submit proposals for the procurement of office furniture, as outlined in the Government of Canada's Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C.

## Product Categories
The tender covers the following product categories under the SA:

* Interconnecting Panels and Freestanding Systems (Cat. 1)
* Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk/Table Products (Cat. 2)
* Metal Filing and Storage Cabinets (Cat. 3)
* Wood Veneer – Freestanding Products (Cat. 4)
* Ancillary and Lighting Products (Cat. 5)
* Support Space Furniture (Cat. 6)

It also includes non-supply arrangement (NSA) products.

## Procurement Details
This tender is set aside for Indigenous Business under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business and for small and minority businesses under the international trade agreements. The CFTA does not apply to this procurement.

## Tender Requirements
No security requirement is associated with this tender. Suppliers are encouraged to consult the bid solicitation document for additional information.

## Contact Information
For any inquiries or clarifications, please contact:

* Shailesh Rajgor, Procurement Officer
* Email: [shaileshkumar.rajgor@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:shaileshkumar.rajgor@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (780) 670-8554

## Tender Documents
To access the tender documents, please visit the following links:

* [English Tender Documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7654/rfp-amend-01-english.pdf)
* [French Tender Documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7654/rfp-amend-01--french_0.pdf)

Note: This is a rewritten version of the text in a more professional and concise manner, within the 400-word limit. It includes the necessary details for the tender announcement, while omitting unnecessary information.  I restored the references to the original bid documents at the end.
